Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First, Ill start by listing out all the cases and their activities to see which ones repeat across the same case. Lets go through each case one by one. Starting with Case C001: Activities in order: 1. Initiate Request 2. Verify Documents 3. Call Customer 4. Submit Additional 5. Verify Documents again 6. Approve Request So here, Verify Documents occurs twice.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The first one is at 920 AM, where the agent checks identity docs. The second is at 1030 AM after the customer submitted additional docs. So the first verification is initial, and the second is after getting more info. So maybe rename the first Initial Document Verification and the second Revised Document Verification or something like that?

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Moving to Case C002: Activities: 1. Initiate Request 2. Verify Documents 3. Call Customer 4. Adjust Account 5. Call Customer again 6. Approve Request Here, Call Customer occurs twice. The first is to clarify an account discrepancy, and the second is a follow-up to confirm adjustments.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Case C003: Activities: 1. Initiate Request 2. Verify Documents 3. Call Customer 4. Adjust Account 5. Verify Documents again 6. Approve Request Again, Verify Documents occurs twice.

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Wait, in C003, the call is only once? Let me check again: Yes, so in C003, Call Customer is only once. The problem says activities that appear multiple times within the same case.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Therefore, the main activities to rename are: For C001: the two Verify Documents instances. For C002: the two Call Customer instances. For C003: the two Verify Documents instances. Other activities like Initiate Request, Approve Request are only once per case, so they dont need renaming.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: For C001s two Verify Documents events: First instance Initial Document Verification Second instance Revised Document Verification. For C002s two Call Customer instances: First Account Discrepancy Clarification Call Second Adjustment Confirmation Follow-Up Call. For C003s two Verify Documents: First Physical Document Verification Second Post-Adjustment Document Re-Verification.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Now, lets make sure that the new names make sense and accurately reflect the context. Let me go through each renamed activity: For C001s Initial Document Verification... Revised Document Verification seems okay. C002s first Call Customer... good. C003s first Verify is physical... Post-Adjustment Document Re-Verification.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Are there any other activities that might need renaming? For example, in C003, the Call Customer is only once... However, since the task is only about activities that repeat within the same case, we dont need to rename that single instance.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Other activities like Submit Additional, Adjust Account dont need renaming as they are unique per case... I think that covers all the required parts.
